CRATE.command.crate.create.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> erstellt!
CRATE.command.crate.create.en-US: [grey]You have crated the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color>!

CRATE.command.delete.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> gelöscht!
CRATE.command.delete.en-US: [grey]You have deleted the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color>!

CRATE.command.crate.add.key.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den [blue]Key</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> zur [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][crateId]</color> hinzugefügt!
CRATE.command.crate.add.key.en-US: [grey]You have added the [blue]Key</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][crateId]</color>!

CRATE.command.crate.remove.key.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den [blue]Key</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> von der [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][crateId]</color> entfernt!
CRATE.command.crate.remove.key.en-US: [grey]You have removed the [blue]Key</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> from the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][crateId]</color>!

CRATE.command.crate.add.item.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das [blue]Item</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> zur [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][crateId]</color> hinzugefügt!
CRATE.command.crate.add.item.en-US: [grey]You have added the [blue]Item</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][crateId]</color>!

CRATE.command.crate.remove.item.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das [blue]Item</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> von der [blue]Crate</color> mit der ID [blue][crateId]</color> entfernt!
CRATE.command.crate.remove.item.en-US: [grey]You have removed the [blue]Item</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> from the [blue]Crate</color> with the ID [blue][crateId]</color>!

CRATE.command.crate.block.remove.en-US: [grey]The block [blue][location]</color> is no longer a [blue]crate block!<color></color>

CRATE.command.crate.block.error.invalid.en-US: [grey]You can [red]not</color> set this block as a [blue]crate block!</color></color>

CRATE.command.keyall.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den [blue]Key</color> mit der ID [blue][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> an alle Spieler verteilt!
CRATE.command.keyall.en-US: [grey]You have given the [blue]Key</color> with the ID [blue][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to all players!
